The Clean Shipping Act is simple: it allows the EPA to require lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions reduction from large vessels that stop at US ports, balancing economic and public health concerns, until we reach our goal of 100% zero emission shipping by 2040. 3/4

We spoke about the #InflationReductionAct‚Äîwhich marks our nation‚Äôs largest investment in combating climate change. We also discussed my Clean Shipping Act‚Äîa bill I introduced a few months ago‚Äîwhich targets many of the maritime pollution issues brought up. 2/4
